description: An Anime themed Telegram group management bot.

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

Token.description: Your Telegram's Bot Token. Get this from @botfather.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SARDEGNA_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as Sardegna users.

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as support users(gban perms only).

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your postgres sql db, empty this field if you dont have one.

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

GBAN_LOGS.description: A channel where bot will print about the users gbanned by you and your disasters.

SYS_ADMIN.description: leave it blank if you don't know about it

LOAD.description: leave it blank if you don't know about it

No_LOAD.description: Dont load these modules cause they shit, space separation

INFOPIC.description: If you wanted to show user image in /info then leave it true else false

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

BAN_STICKER.description: ID of the sticker you want to use when banning people.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

CUSTOM_CMD.description: If you dont know how this works leave it as it is

CASH_API_KEY.description: Required for currency converter. Get yours from https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key

TIME_API_KEY.description: Required for timezone information. Get yours from https://timezonedb.com/api

spamwatch_api.description: Spamwatch API Token, Get one from @SpamWatchBot.

LASTFM_API_KEY.description: For Lastfm module. Get one from https://www.last.fm/api/account/create.

WALL_API.description: Required for wallpaper. Get your's from https://wall.alphacoders.com/

name: Kigyō bot
